mapper.select: SELECT AC.CODE_ID, ( SELECT CODE_NM FROM A_CODE_LANG ACL WHERE ACL.CODE_GROUP_ID = ACG.CODE_GROUP_ID AND ACL.CODE_ID = AC.CODE_ID AND LANG_CD = #{langCd}) AS CODE_NM FROM A_CODE_GROUP ACG INNER JOIN A_CODE AC ON ACG.CODE_GROUP_ID = AC.CODE_GROUP_ID WHERE ACG.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ACG.CODE_GROUP_ID = #{codeGroupId} ORDER BY AC.SEQ
